channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Customer Area
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Customer Area

item.title: CVE-2023-6824|2024-10-22T16:01:51.455Z -- unknown -- wp%20customer%20area
item.description: The WP Customer Area WordPress plugin before 8.2.1 does not properly validates user capabilities in some of its AJAX actions, allowing any users to retrieve other user's account address.
